text: I sure saw a lot of kids that I'm sure didn't know a lot about us, or we were definitely new to them. The kids who came up to me afterward, we'd talk about music, sign a lot of autographs. So I'm sure we made a lot of new fans.
author: Joan Jett

text: I think what I'm going to do is get more balance in my life to still be able to go out and play the hard rock 'n' roll and do what I like to do in music.
author: Joan Jett

text: So it was out of necessity that Blackheart was born. I think it's great that now, 25 years later, we're not only putting out our own music, but are able to put out music by other bands. That's really exciting for us.
author: Joan Jett

text: I've done some acting and a lot of different things, but mostly it's the music.
author: Joan Jett

text: Before I settled on music, I wanted to be an archaeologist, an astronaut, all sorts of really diverse things.
author: Joan Jett
